channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Word
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Word

item.title: CVE-2019-0561|2024-08-04T17:51:27.119Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20word
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Microsoft Word macro buttons are used improperly, aka "Microsoft Word Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Word, Office 365 ProPlus, Microsoft Office, Word.
